snippet: The estate of the artist Jean-Michel Basquiat sued Christie’s, saying the auction house was selling works as Basquiats without sufficient evidence.
abstract: The estate of the artist Jean-Michel Basquiat sued Christie’s, saying the auction house was selling works as Basquiats without sufficient evidence.

headline.main: Basquiat Estate Sues Christie's, Saying Some Works For Sale May Not Be Real
headline.print_headline: Basquiat’s Sisters Sue Christie’s Over Sale
